DOC.brief_summary: Patients with a primary unilateral inguinal hernia are randomized to Lichtenstein's operation or Prolene Hernia System to repair their groin hernia. Follow up for three years with a total number of 4 clinical examinations. End point is postoperative pain and recurrences.
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-site Trial Comparing Lichtensteins Operation and Prolene Hernia System in Inguinal HErnia Repair
DOC.criteria: Primary unilateral groin hernia in adult recurrence warfarin treatment bilateral groin hernia
